comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:11.0a1) Gecko/20111122 Firefox/11.0a1
Build ID: 20111122040325

Steps to reproduce:

Open browser and press FN+F9, FN+F10 combinations on Sony Laptop (vaio vpcz1290x)


Actual results:

Laptop notifies with a beep that combination is valid, however no zooming out/in in firefox


Expected results:

As it normally happens in Windows Internet Explorer (v9) page should be zoomed, this should have the same effect as Ctrl+MouseWheel.
No Additional Soft for IE, no Blocking Addons for FF (clean install)
comments.creator: max@maxgrass.eu
comments.author: max@maxgrass.eu
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:11.0a1) Gecko/20111122 Firefox/11.0a1
Build ID: 20111122040325

Steps to reproduce:

Open browser and press FN+F9, FN+F10 combinations on Sony Laptop (vaio vpcz1290x)


Actual results:

Laptop notifies with a beep that combination is valid, however no zooming out/in in firefox


Expected results:

As it normally happens in Windows Internet Explorer (v9) page should be zoomed, this should have the same effect as Ctrl+MouseWheel.
No Additional Soft for IE, no Blocking Addons for FF (clean install)

comments.creator: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.author: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.raw_text: I'm not sure how this can be a Firefox bug and not a driver bug. There is no windows API for zooming and and activating the zoom function is a 100% driver issue.
comments.text: I'm not sure how this can be a Firefox bug and not a driver bug. There is no windows API for zooming and and activating the zoom function is a 100% driver issue.

comments.creator: panagiotis.papagapiou@gmail.com
comments.author: panagiotis.papagapiou@gmail.com
comments.text: I did have the same problem but i solved it simply by going to Vaio Control Center, selected "Special Buttons" at the end of the options list and unchecked the box for "Document Zoom".
comments.raw_text: I did have the same problem but i solved it simply by going to Vaio Control Center, selected "Special Buttons" at the end of the options list and unchecked the box for "Document Zoom".
